TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit NotSupportedException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 当调用的方法不受支持时，或者当尝试读取、搜索或写入不支持所调用功能的流时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an invoked method is not supported, or when there is an attempt to read, seek, or write to a stream that does not support the invoked functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示为调用的方法或属性存在没有实现。 indicates that no implementation exists for an invoked method or property. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_NOTSUPPORTED，其值 0x80131515。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_NOTSUPPORTED, which has the value 0x80131515. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## 引发 NotSupportedException 异常Throwing a NotSupportedException exception 你可以考虑引发在以下情况下的异常：You might consider throwing a exception in the following cases: - 要实现通用接口，并且许多方法具有没有有意义的实现。You are implementing a general-purpose interface, and number of the methods have no meaningful implementation. 例如，如果要创建的日期和时间类型该实现接口，将引发大部分转换异常。For example, if you are creating a date and time type that implements the interface, you would throw a exception for most of the conversions. - 一个抽象类，需要重写多种方法从继承。You've inherited from an abstract class that requires that you override a number of methods. 但是，您仅准备提供这些子集的实现。However, you're only prepared to provide an implementation for a subset of these. 对于不想实现的方法，你可选择引发。For the methods that you decide not to implement, you can choose to throw a . - 你定义的有条件地启用操作的状态的通用类型。You are defining a general-purpose type with a state that enables operations conditionally. 例如，你的类型可以是只读的也读写。For example, your type can be either read-only or read-write. 在这种情况下：In that case: - 如果对象是只读的尝试将值分配到的属性的修改实例状态的实例或调用的方法应引发异常。If the object is read-only, attempting to assign values to the properties of an instance or call methods that modify instance state should throw a exception. - 应实现一个属性，返回值，该值指示特定的功能是否可用。You should implement a property that returns a value that indicates whether particular functionality is available. 例如，可以是只读或读写的类型，你可以实现`IsReadOnly`属性，该值指示是否可用或不可用的读写方法集。For example, for a type that can be either read-only or read-write, you could implement a `IsReadOnly` property that indicates whether the set of read-write methods are available or unavailable. ## 处理 NotSupportedException 异常Handling a NotSupportedException exception 异常指示的方法具有没有实现，并且，你应不调用它。The exception indicates that a method has no implementation and that you should not call it. 不应处理的异常。You should not handle the exception. 相反，你应执行的操作取决于异常的原因： 是否实现为完全不存在，或该成员的调用不一致目的在于对象 (如调用方法上的只读对象.Instead, what you should do depends on the cause of the exception: whether an implementation is completely absent , or the member invocation is inconsistent with the purpose of an object (such as a call to the method on a read-only object . **尚未提供实现，由于不能以有意义的方式执行该操作。****An implementation has not been provided because the operation cannot be performed in a meaningful way.** 将在提供的抽象基类或该实现方法的实现的通用接口的对象上调用方法时，这是常见的异常和此方法不具有任何有意义的实现。This is a common exception when you are calling methods on an object that provides implementations for the methods of an abstract base class, or that implements a general-purpose interface, and the method has no meaningful implementation. 例如，类实现接口，这意味着它必须包括将每个基元类型转换为每个其他基元类型的方法。For example, the class implements the interface, which means that it must include a method to convert every primitive type to every other primitive type. 许多这些转换，但是，不可能。Many of those conversions, however, are not possible. 因此，调用方法，例如，将引发异常因为之间没有可能转换和值As a result, a call to the method, for instance, throws a exception because there is no possible conversion between a and a value 若要消除此异常，应消除方法调用。To eliminate the exception, you should eliminate the method call. **方法调用不支持给定对象的状态。****The method call is not supported given the state of the object.** 你尝试调用其功能将不可用的因为对象的状态的成员。You are attempting to invoke a member whose functionality is unavailable because of the object's state. 你可以消除三种方式之一中的异常：You can eliminate the exception in one of three ways: - 提前知道对象的状态，但已调用了不受支持的方法或属性。You know the state of the object in advance, but you've invoked an unsupported method or property. 在这种情况下，该成员的调用是一个错误，并可以消除它。In this case, the member invocation is an error, and you can eliminate it. - （通常是因为你的代码具有其进行实例化） 事先知道对象的状态，但该对象是配置错误。You know the state of the object in advance (usually because your code has instantiated it), but the object is mis-configured. 下面的示例阐释了此问题。The following example illustrates this issue. 它将创建一个只读的对象，然后尝试对其进行写入。It creates a read-only object and then attempts to write to it. [!code-csharp[System.NotSupportedException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.NotSupportedException/cs/BadState1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.NotSupportedException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.NotSupportedException/vb/BadState1.vb#1)] 你可以消除实例化的对象支持的功能，你想通过确保异常。You can eliminate the exception by ensuring that the instantiated object supports the functionality you intend. 下面的示例解决了问题，只读的对象提供到正确的自变量构造函数。The following example addresses the problem of the read-only object by providing the correct arguments to the constructor. - 你不知道对象的状态，请提前和对象不支持某一特定操作。You don't know the state of the object in advance, and the object doesn't support a particular operation. 在大多数情况下，该对象应包括的属性或方法，该值指示它是否支持一组特定的操作。In most cases, the object should include a property or method that indicates whether it supports a particular set of operations. 你可以通过检查对象的值和调用该成员，仅当相应消除异常。You can eliminate the exception by checking the value of the object and invoking the member only if appropriate. 下面的示例定义`DetectEncoding`引发方法它尝试从不支持读取访问流的开始位置读取时出现异常。The following example defines a `DetectEncoding` method that throws a exception when it attempts to read from the beginning of a stream that does not support read access. [!code-csharp[System.NotSupportedException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.NotSupportedException/cs/TestProp1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.NotSupportedException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.NotSupportedException/vb/TestProp1.vb#3)] 你可以通过检查的值来消除异常属性和退出方法，如果流是只读的。You can eliminate the exception by examining the value of the property and exiting the method if the stream is read-only. [!code-csharp[System.NotSupportedException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.NotSupportedException/cs/TestProp2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.NotSupportedException#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.NotSupportedException/vb/TestProp2.vb#4)] ## 相关的异常类型Related exception types 与其他两个异常类型; 密切相关异常The exception is closely related to two other exception types; 。. 当一种方法无法实现，但不是，引发此异常因为将在更高版本中实现成员、 成员不可用在特定平台上，或成员属于一个抽象类和派生的类必须提供即时消息plementation。This exception is thrown when a method could be implemented but is not, either because the member will be implemented in a later version, the member is not available on a particular platform, or the member belongs to an abstract class and a derived class must provide an implementation. 在方案中，它通常有时可能是为该对象来执行请求的操作，将引发此异常和对象状态确定是否可以执行该操作。This exception is thrown in scenarios in which it is generally sometimes possible for the object to perform the requested operation, and the object state determines whether the operation can be performed. ## .NET compact Framework 说明.NET Compact Framework notes 当使用 [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)] 并对本机函数使用 P/Invoke 时，如果出现以下情况，则会引发此异常：When working with the [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)] and using P/Invoke on a native function, this exception may be thrown if: - 托管代码中的声明不正确。The declaration in managed code is incorrect. - [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)] 不支持尝试执行的操作。The [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)] does not support what you are trying to do. - DLL 名称在导出时难以分辨。The DLL names are mangled on export. 如果引发异常，请检查：If a exception is thrown, check: - 任何违反 [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)] P/Invoke 限制的行为。For any violations of the [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)] P/Invoke restrictions. - 任何需要预分配内存的参数。For any arguments that require pre-allocated memory. 如果存在这种情况，应传递对现有变量的引用。If these exist, you should pass a reference to an existing variable. - 导出的函数的名称正确。That the names of the exported functions are correct. 这可以使用验证[DumpBin.exe](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1h23y6c.aspx)。This can be verified with [DumpBin.exe](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1h23y6c.aspx). - 您没有尝试传递过多的参数。That you are not attempting to pass too many arguments.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将新实例的 属性设置为系统提供的描述错误的消息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.

summary.span: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

span.span: This message takes into account the current system culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为空引用，则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
